entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:37 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:37 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
